doc.title: PDF

value.content: PDF (Portable Document Format) is a file format used to share documentation without depending on any particular software implementation, hardware platform, or operating system. PDF provides a digital image of a printed document, and keeps the same appearance when printed.

doc.summary: PDF (Portable Document Format) is a file format used to share documentation without depending on any particular software implementation, hardware platform, or operating system. PDF provides a digital image of a printed document, and keeps the same appearance when printed.
